channel.title: Help plz! asap
channel.description: ok so im an admin for xlinescape v2.7 (mine) thats my name in game, and at this moment im geting so many new people and i just need to know how to kick bann them because they are abusing the system and its messing up our server bluurr isent on nither is co owner im the only admin there. please!!

item.title: Help plz! asap
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Nate Mod Nate
item.description:
@Mod_Nate wrote:

acctaully if your admin you can mod/admin you can right click and press kick … but if you want to bann you use ::bannuser (there name here), and if you want to ip ban then go to the person char folder get there ip then go to your ipbann folder and paste it in there and bravo theyre ip banned,banned,or kick… you can also mute too…

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz! asap
item.dc:creator: @daanrack daanrack
item.description:
@daanrack wrote:

pretty easy, commands: ::kickuser name of the user ::banipuser name of the user ::banuser name of the user.

Read full topic
